Package cz.cuni.mff.java.klima.pacman

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.cuni.mff.java.klima.pacman.Game
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The Game class is the main class of the HungryPacMan game responsible for running the game loop (tick and render).

    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        Game​(java.lang.String title,
     int width,
     int height)
        Constructor of the main Game class. It takes the game's title, its width and height as parameters. It also initializes the local variables, such as score, lives, etc.
        Parameters:
        title - the game title
        width - the game width
        height - the game height
